java/liquibase/preconditions/CustomPreconditionWrapper.java

00001 package liquibase.preconditions;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.exception.*;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.DatabaseChangeLog;
00006 import liquibase.util.ObjectUtil;
00007 
00008 import java.util.SortedSet;
00009 import java.util.TreeSet;
00010 import java.util.Map;
00011 import java.util.HashMap;
00012 import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
00013 
00014 public class CustomPreconditionWrapper implements Precondition {
00015 
00016     private String className;
00017     private ClassLoader classLoader;
00018 
00019     private SortedSet<String> params = new TreeSet<String>();
00020     private Map<String, String> paramValues = new HashMap<String, String>();
00021 
00022     public String getClassName() {
00023         return className;
00024     }
00025 
00026     public void setClassName(String className) {
00027         this.className = className;
00028     }
00029 
00030     public ClassLoader getClassLoader() {
00031         return classLoader;
00032     }
00033 
00034     public void setClassLoader(ClassLoader classLoader) {
00035         this.classLoader = classLoader;
00036     }
00037 
00038     public void setParam(String name, String value) {
00039         this.params.add(name);
00040         this.paramValues.put(name, value);
00041     }
00042 
00043 
00044     public void check(Database database, DatabaseChangeLog changeLog) throws PreconditionFailedException, PreconditionErrorException {
00045         CustomPrecondition customPrecondition;
00046         try {
00047 //            System.out.println(classLoader.toString());
00048             try {
00049                 customPrecondition = (CustomPrecondition) Class.forName(className, true, classLoader).newInstance();
00050             } catch (ClassCastException e) { //fails in Ant in particular
00051                 customPrecondition = (CustomPrecondition) Class.forName(className).newInstance();
00052             }
00053         } catch (Exception e) {
00054             throw new PreconditionFailedException("Could not open custom precondition class "+className, changeLog, this);
00055         }
00056 
00057         for (String param : params) {
00058             try {
00059                 ObjectUtil.setProperty(customPrecondition, param, paramValues.get(param));
00060             } catch (Exception e) {
00061                 throw new PreconditionFailedException("error setting parameter "+param+" on custom precondition "+className, changeLog, this);
00062             }
00063         }
00064 
00065         try {
00066             customPrecondition.check(database);
00067         } catch (CustomPreconditionFailedException e) {
00068             throw new PreconditionFailedException(new FailedPrecondition("Custom Precondition Failed: "+e.getMessage(), changeLog, this));
00069         } catch (CustomPreconditionErrorException e) {
00070             throw new PreconditionErrorException(new ErrorPrecondition(e.getCause(), changeLog, this));
00071         }
00072     }
00073 
00074     public String getTagName() {
00075         return "customPrecondition";
00076     }
00077 }
